title: Q&A Visualization - Natural Language Generation Visualization in Power BI Desktop
excerpt: In this vLog, we will discuss about new rolled out feature by Microsoft during October 2019 update which is new Q&A visualization for the Power BI Desktop. This Q&A visualization is the first visual which supports NLG (Natural Language Generation). In easy term we can say that, we can ask the question
